Even from a distance the Tower arena can be seen with its dark marble stone and gold banners across its top. A wide and well-used dirt path can be seen twisting through the valley.</font><font color="#008787"> Hovering on two scarlet leathery wings, this daemonite seems to have a vicious glint to its eyes. Dripping with blood, an inverted pentagram floats in mid-air. A black, murky mist has settled here. The shadows bend and contort to the form of this nightmare, red eyes glaring from out of the darkness. </font><font color="#3737FF">You see a single exit leading north</font><font color="#C2C2C2">. &lt;</font><font color="#37FF37">337</font><font color="#C2C2C2">h </font><font color="#37FF37">317</font><font color="#C2C2C2">m </font><font color="#37FF37">1346</font><font color="#C2C2C2">e </font><font color="#37FF37">1580</font><font color="#C2C2C2">w 36%&gt; &lt;-</font><font color="#008700">b </font><font color="#37FFFF">DB</font><font color="#C2C2C2"> </font><font color="#999999">-</font><font color="#FFFF37">M</font><font color="#C2C2C2">&gt; You feel an aura of rebounding surround you.
